title: Acme FinTech: Modern ETL for Cost Savings
subtitle: Reduce spend, accelerate insights
script: Acme FinTech is modernizing its ETL processes to reduce infrastructure costs and accelerate data insights. By consolidating fragmented pipelines and improving data governance, we aim to minimize compliance risk and unlock faster analytics for the business.
image_prompt: Professional, modern illustration of interconnected data pipelines flowing into a centralized dashboard, emphasizing efficiency and governance.
